@nitroin Thank you for submitting this PR! I see this is your first time submitting to DefinitelyTyped 👋 — I'm the local bot who will help you through the process of getting things through.

***This is a live comment which I will keep updated.***

## 1 package in this PR

* `mathjs` (*new!*) — [on npm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/mathjs), [on unpkg](https://unpkg.com/browse/mathjs@latest/)

## Code Reviews

This PR adds a new definition, so it needs to be reviewed by a DT maintainer before it can be merged.

You can test the changes of this PR [in the Playground](https://www.typescriptlang.org/play/?dtPR=53121&install-plugin=playground-dt-review).

## Status

 * ✅ No merge conflicts
 * ✅ Continuous integration tests have passed

Once every item on this list is checked, I'll ask you for permission to merge and publish the changes.
